website_summaries.verdict: Highly affordable with terrific safety ratings. Available in both Cars and a Disney princess theme.
pros: Some kids really enjoy these themes
cons: Seat can slide a bit and can be a narrow fit for larger children

customer_reviews.title: We were in a head on car accident last night ...
customer_reviews.text: We were in a head on car accident last night and our boys were in these booster seats. While I'm sure the fact we were in a solid vehicle helped these seats withstood impact, no cracks and the boys had no major injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I like this booster car seat, but am disappointed in the covering that Graco is using now. I used the same Graco booster car seat 10 years ago for my grandson & it lasted forever. My granddaughter has only been using this one for 2 months & the seat cover material is starting to wear thin & will probably need to be replaced in a month or 2 at the most. Very disappointed Graco.
customer_reviews.author: Vickid

customer_reviews.title: Just what the little/big guy asked for.
customer_reviews.text: This seat is on the money. My little guy is ready for a booster and he made his feelings known to the family that he no longer needed the regular car seat. This is the second purchase of this seat as we needed one for the other car. We added a seat belt adjuster for him to better apply the seat belt with him now using the booster. He feels empowered and older now that he's in a big guy seat. Great booster seat. HSELL® Pack of 2 Child Seat Belt Adjuster, Car Safety Cover Strap Adjuster Pad Harness, Comfortable Protection for Adult Children Keep Belt Away From
customer_reviews.author: glennno

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.text: Arm rests not included in shipment, seat covering snagged/torn in several areas, and appeared used. Returning ASAP! Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. I returned this after 29 days. After normal use the threads started coming out. If you zoom in very close on the picture you can see this is made of fabric mesh, this mesh comes apart easily. Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Mr P Shopper

customer_reviews.title: it is strongly recommended to use LATCH and/or tether anchors in vehicles equipped ...
customer_reviews.text: i was shocked this has no latch system! it is bein returned. as my diono radion guide states, 'Unsecured objects can become flying hazards and can cause serious injury in a accident. While not required, it is strongly recommended to use LATCH and/or tether anchors in vehicles equipped with such anchorages.' my thoughts exactly!
customer_reviews.author: joule

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not the best booster seat.
customer_reviews.text: I like the booster car seat because it takes less space, easy to install and more easy to carry. If you are traveling out of the city and planning to take a car there its easy to carry, you can even keep it in your luggage. I like the hide-away cup holde style it's innovative and very useful. I have used other car seats from Graco but thins one I don't like that much because of the cushioning, it should have more cushion padded seats so that kids can seat on it comfortably. The armrest is also not well padded and it's hard to remove once you set it. But yes as per the price this booster seat is good.
customer_reviews.author: B Roy.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: i bought the seat for my 5-year old granddaughter because Graco generally makes a good product. She is slender, well-behaved and sits quietly in the seat. Because the weather here is warm, she was wearing little dresses and sandals... nothing big or scratchy. Within 4 days the seat was torn, frayed and pulling. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crash tested and approved! Bought another one!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and 6 yr old were hit by an elderly woman yesterday. While both were terrified as the airbag went off thankfully nobody was seriously injured. My daughter was in this booster seat and it withstood the accident— no cracks, or damage. Even the Cop said it was good she was in a booster seat as she had no major injuries. The cop said still we should get s new booster seat as once they are in accidents, structurally their integrity is compromised. I just ordered another one of these booster seats on prime because for the $$ You can’t beat the safety, features, and ease of transport.
customer_reviews.author: IcePick06

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOSTER SEAT
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these booster seats for my grandchildren who often visit and they worked great!! They are very easy to install. You just sit them on the seat of the car and the child secures them with the lap and shoulder belt. They can be removed in a second and stores away if not needed. They also have cup holders at the front corners so your child could keep a bottle of juice or water while traveling. They are very comfortable too. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIEDOLL

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I chose this booster seat because of the high reviews. It is well made and my son says it is comfortable. I like everything about it except for the fact that there isn't a way to secure it to the car seat. I have leather seats in my car and it slides all over when my son isn't in it. I know it is strictly a booster seat and not meant for safety so this is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya B

customer_reviews.title: Used (abuses) product shipped
customer_reviews.text: A completely used (better said abused) product was shipped. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Poor fabric quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these as spare car seats for my twins in a secondary vehicle. They have been used literally less than a handful of times for a short ride from school. That said, both seats are already frayed and have pulls all over the fabric. They make my new car look shabby at best. Terrible fabric quality and poor durability. Not worth it even at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Marditi

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I held on to my childs front facing carseat as long as I could. I always felt it was safer and did not want to change. I bought this one random day just to try out a booster seat and see how we liked it, without breaking the bank if I regretted my choice. Needless to say, I did not! We love it. She can actually buckle herself up without my help and it has two cute cup holders attached.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Going from a car seat to these is life changing
customer_reviews.text: Once my kid got big enough, i switched to these and OMG what a difference it is. My car seat cost $175, was big and clunky, hard to bring places, etc. This thing is like the exact opposite: fraction of the price, easy to put together, take with places, etc. I made sure my kid was about 5 pounds over the recommended weight (40lbs) before i switched over, as your kids safety should always be top priority.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse L. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Easy and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great for easy vehicle transitions. The two cup holders are great. One for a drink, one for a snack. However, our 4 year old complained of the seat being hard for the longer trips, over an hour of driving. It comes with an adjustable strap to help with the vehicle's chest belt properly fitting our child, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good solid booster
customer_reviews.text: Payed just a little more for this one for the cup holders. They are a must in our family. Easy to install. Comes with adjuster for the seat belt also. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Peeling woven material
customer_reviews.text: Fabric tearing after a month of very occasional use. It's kind of like fuzzy peeling all over as if someone keeps rubbing velcro over it. While it still functions as a booster, it's material is extremely poor. The cupholders also do not work well for our kids tervis water cup or even mini water bottles. They tumble out of the low base holder, so we just use the cup holder in our car. I would purchase again if fabric was different, but have no plans to buy again for my other kids because I see this as falling apart and needing replaced within the next year at max.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Helps an older child sit with seatbelt positioned properly.
customer_reviews.text: Got this booster as a secondary seat, for Dad’s vehicle. It’s not as safe and secure as her full car seat with harness, which she usually uses, but it allows her to sit relatively safely with the seat belt positioned properly, while riding with her dad. It keeps us from having to switch the car seat back and forth between vehicles, and is more affordable than a second car seat. Just make sure your child meets the height and weight safety standards for this booster, and it seems to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: MAT

customer_reviews.title: Does not clip into car
customer_reviews.text: This seat looks nice, but does not clip into the car. The idea was to make the kindergartener more independent with buckling himself in, but this seat requires the seatbelt to be run through a strap attached to the back of the seat that has to be pulled up into place when the child gets in. Far too complex for a 5 year old to handle alone. Returning and ordering one that clips into place.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: 5 point safety, comfortable.  Poor fit in my Subaru
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable booster Has a5 point safety It is a little too wide for my car...I have to push it up the cushion in order to buckle up the seat belt. Them adjust it back again to fit securely against the seat. My other booster didn't have the safety strap to adjust the chest strap but it fit better in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Charla Barton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lightweight booster with fold in cupholders.
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable yet lightweight booster seat with fold in, sturdy cupholders, one on each side. My five-year-old grandson loves using it and can easily move it from one place to the other in the car or carry it himself traveling. Also convenient to toss in trunk when it isn’t needed Or could be thrown in the floor of the car when folding down seats.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Burke

customer_reviews.title: Bad Fabric Choice
customer_reviews.text: The fabric outer layer where the child sits is made of a jersey-like material which snags on everything. Within a day or two it was ripped and looked like we'd had it for months. Other than that, the fold-away cup holders, light weight and design of the seat are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping, nice booster seats.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, they arrived really quickly. Nicely boxed. My son is extremely excited to have a "big boy" carseat. It took less than one minute to snap the arm rests on, as we were heading out the door to go to the store. The 2 cup holders will come in handy, one for his drink, and one for his random rock collection.
customer_reviews.author: Kells

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with latch strap.
customer_reviews.text: This car booster seat doesn’t come with a latch strap. Also, the padding of seat is thin so is not very comfortable. All the fabric pieces can be remove for machine wash which is nice, but I don’t recommend it because it doesn’t have a latch strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jsf1313

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE AND UNSTABLE
customer_reviews.text: This seat would be be great if I could keep It stable. There are no attachments to the car itself which makes this seat unsafe. It wobbles because it’s missing those attachments. Just a booster seat that slides when you turn the car or stop abruptly.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Giannini

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like just about everything with this booster seat. It is sturdy and easy to assemble. The fabric is all removable and washable and is easy to take off and put back on again. The only thing that I don't like is the padding's thickness. Like most car-seats and boosters, the padding always seems lacking. I just buy some from a hobby shop and slip it underneath to give it the extra padding for longer trips.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lug around if you take Uber or Lyft
customer_reviews.text: If you need to haul your booster seat around with you when using ride-share, this is a good one. Very easy to buckle the little one into, safe, and not to heavy to carry around. Works as a booster in the restaurant too.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid really likes it
customer_reviews.text: This seat is easy peasy, it's just enough to get the seat belt in the right place for my son. He loves the choice of cupholders and has fun alternating use of them. My son is a tall, skinny 9 year old. Without the seat the belt comes too much across his belly instead of his hips.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Great booster. Light weight and comfortable for kid. The cup holders are great for preventing a spill.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The material on this seat started showing wear within two weeks after purchase. Quality is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super seats!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and they are perfect! Well made and comfy for my girls!! These are a great value for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Lovingdecor18

customer_reviews.title: Decent booster
customer_reviews.text: Kid has liked this for comfort (1000s of miles with no complaints) Very convenient - easy to move from car to car... Easy to clean. Wish the cup holders were deeper... anything taller than 4in wants to tip.
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: The Galaxy pills!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the booster, it’s lightweight and easy to transport. The cupholders can be tucked in, which I love. I had this same booster for my oldest son. BUT, this particular color or fabric pills horribly and immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia Araiza

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful transition from car seat
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter was ready to move from the 5 point harness to a booster seat using the regular seatbelt. This booster seat is a wonderful help for her to be able to see out the window comfortably and yet meets all our expectations for safety. She is tall for her age and soon will no longer need the boost, but right now it fits her needs.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Dial

customer_reviews.title: Great little back up booster seat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a back up for the booster seat we have, in case LO goes with Grandma somewhere or something. It is a great lightweight booster seat. Seems comfy for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! It’s not bulky which was very important for me. Can easily transfer to another car. Love it
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good seat
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice seat and I wish it was able fasten to buckle. It doesn’t felt 100% safe, but it’s so much better quality than something we’ve bought from Walmart and also price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Bayaraa Oyuntseren

customer_reviews.title: Should be a little better
customer_reviews.text: The design of these boosters make them clearly the simplest and best way to transport kids safely. But the fabric on this particular model was a disappointment. One time on a plane and they were snagged and damaged--and maybe even before then. It seems obvious that car seat fabric should be indestructible. The "Galaxy" fabric leaves some durability to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Great value basic car seat.
customer_reviews.text: With two in car seats, the older one was ready to graduate into a booster. Love the price of this that I bought two! Now, travelling with 7 of us just got a little less cramped with this booster in the place of the old big booster. With this booster, flying will be alot easier too when we meet all of our stuff in baggage claim. Great name brand and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Best booster seat I’ve bought! This is easy to install and easy to move from one vehicle to the next. The cushion is comfy too! A lot better than previous booster seats I have purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Coil

customer_reviews.title: Fabric snags easily
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the safety features are great. And, it is easy to install and easy to move around. However, the fabric snags easily. After using this for a week, there's tons of snags all on the fabric and it looks terrible. Graco should use more durable fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: It came with a seatbelt adjuster which was nice and I didn't realize so my kid could make ...
customer_reviews.text: I've researched and couldn't find any difference between backless or with so bought this to use while we were travelling. It came with a seatbelt adjuster which was nice and I didn't realize so my kid could make sure the seatbelt went over the shoulder nicely. Having 2 cup holders was definitely a pro
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: It was time to upgrade my son's spare car seat to a spare booster. This one is inexpensive, lightweight, and super easy to install. Just set it down on the seat and buckle them in! I traveled with it, and it's perfect for that too. An excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: AustinLady

customer_reviews.title: Good booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand , the quality and the cup holders . The only negative is that it doesn’t come with a saftey buckle that you have to purchase separately. I guess it’s safe to use without one but what a peace of mind that one simple little buckle gives.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Great booster
customer_reviews.text: It is just the right size to have in the car as a booster seat. I like the fact that the cupholders store away inside of the booster. The great matches the interior of my car and it looks decent in the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and move from car to car. Can't wait til I can get my 4 year old (the baby) into one of these and finally get some room back in the back seat!
customer_reviews.author: Sam D.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters outgrew the car seat, so I got this booster instead. I just slip it into the car and remove it when I don't need it. It's convenient, durable, and easy to use. No need to have it attached to any hooks or toggles, and it has cup holders!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Scher

customer_reviews.title: Room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Great booster seat, just wish the edges on the bottom side and back were a little bit more rounded, for fear of tearing or degrading my leather seats in the long run. Works well though.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: My son is happy
customer_reviews.text: Great booster car seat, the little guy loves it my only problem with it are the cup holders, they're not very deep so most cups and thermos just fall out. I found out the hard way and had quite the the mess to clean up
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and small
customer_reviews.text: I love the 2 cup holders for my daughter and it's pretty small to take anywhere as I used it to go to Alaska and daily trips with my daughter and when not in use I put it away and doesn't take much trunk space. I also use it as an uber driver when parent's forget to bring a booster seat for there kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Isaac Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: A latch system is better since it lets them actually reach the (included)
customer_reviews.text: This is wide enough that it is very hard for my child to fasten his own seatbelt. I tried it both with him at 7, then a year later at 8 - still no go. A latch system is better since it lets them actually reach the (included) seatbelts
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Watt

customer_reviews.title: lighweight
customer_reviews.text: Great little booster seat I bought 2 of them. My only problem is that one came with the hole in the cushion. Can't seem to get hold of Graco to replace the seat cover cause they're closed by the time I'm off of work.
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: Good booster seat quality, but there are no straps to secure to the seat.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality booster seat, which I would have rated 5 stars if it came with the straps to secure it to the seat. I ended up buying straps separately. I would have purchased a level up if I knew they were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Roland P

customer_reviews.title: Good booster
customer_reviews.text: Booster seat works very well for my 9 year old who is just under the weight limit in our state. Easy to move in and out of the car and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Maya W

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Wide.
customer_reviews.text: This is well constructed and nice. The only issue I have is the very wide base makes it difficult to buckle in narrow seats. I have a Mercedes C300 and it does not fit. It does well in our Toyota 4-runner, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had one in my car for months and we never realized it had cup holders 🤦‍♀️. We bought a second one for dad's car.
customer_reviews.author: sandybeachh

customer_reviews.title: Sit for a bit
customer_reviews.text: VERY lightweight so it's perfect for airline and rental car travel. Quick and easy to install. Kids like it...the pad is a little skimpy so it might become uncomfortable on a long trip but for an hour or two it works great.
customer_reviews.author: BWM

customer_reviews.title: Easy for travel or Uber/Lyft.
customer_reviews.text: Amzazing, easy, and lightweight.My son was finally big enough for this style right when my car bit the dust. We used this for a few months taking Uber's and it made travel possible not lugging around a full car seat. Nothing special about it, but it works, was a good price, and it was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: We love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Just make sure you thread the seat belt through the arm rests before fastening. We did not use the tethers that reposition the shoulder strap. It's a pain. Our grandsons are 5 and 7 and these really make our lives easier. The car seats were a chore to install and remove before getting these. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Warren Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, works as advertised but with all booster style seats, the kids legs dangle which kinda makes it uncomfortable for them until they can reach floorboard or you put something down for them to rest feet on.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Lasseter

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: They work well enough but they should add lumbar support for the kids and the material hasn’t held up well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Seat Material Didn’t hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for grandson who was visiting. Only used it for a week and the seat material started tattering! Very disappointed. Contacted GRACO for refund and or replacement. Submitted claim with pictures two weeks ago and haven’t heard a word back from them .
customer_reviews.author: Appleknocker

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is perfect for my grand daughter. I think you wouldn't go wrong purchasing this one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Staton

customer_reviews.title: Moves around on seat
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but felt like it was unstable in my seat and moved around even when fastened, I bought one with a back and gave this one away
customer_reviews.author: Sophie K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good value easy to maintain
customer_reviews.text: Came together and undamaged and easy to put together. Great for value and mild comfort ability for kids but this is the greatest u will find for value
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my preschool granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the booster as it doesn't clip in and just sits on the seat and the child sits in it. It was a little thin on the padding of the seat, so I slid an additional 1' foam under the cover to pad the seat more. Otherwise it was great, affordable, and my picky granddaughter was good with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend. Daughter feels like a big girl when using this. Took a few tries for her to get the hang of it, but once she learned, she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Idaly

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my great niece and she loves it. It has two cup holders and the material is excellent. she feels like a big girl in her seat. I would highly recommend this seat and the price is great. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is light weight and is very easily moved from vehicle to vehicle. The cup holders are very handy. Note this does not anchor to the seat of the car in any way but is easy to maneuver the seat belt around to buckle the child into the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Johns

customer_reviews.title: Pulled Threads
customer_reviews.text: I bought this booster and it helped me a lot, my daughter do not need to take her coat to buckle herself and it helps me a lot, but I recently bought it and has so many pulled threads and it looks like an old booster.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro V Aveiro

customer_reviews.title: That he likes it and it’s comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this booster seat. It works out well for my 6 year old grandson who I take to school every day as well as pick him up. I was tired of having to be without a booster seat for him when my daughter forgot hers or left it at home. Now I always have one and he likes it very much. Very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Terri S. Raines

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and great price!
customer_reviews.text: love the versaitlity. We grab it from our car and throw it in grandmas car. We took it on a flight and it was the easiest thing to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This has been sooo durable! My son is 5 now, and we've had this for about 2 years? Not even the fabric has torn, and he can reach around it to buckle himself him on his own. So easy to take out of the car and put it in a different one, when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Confetti6

customer_reviews.title: No straps to fasten to the car
customer_reviews.text: I have another one of those, which I bought a few years ago and this one did not come with straps fastening it to the car. A small disappointment, but maybe safety standards have changed...
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka Cram

customer_reviews.title: My grand niece named her Rosie
customer_reviews.text: My grand niece outgrew her car seat and needed to graduate to a booster seat and this was perfect! She named it Rosie and we decorated it with stickers and ribbons. Graco is a good brand and we weren't disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Well made and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a full sized car seat we had for years. Love how the cup holders retract and my son loves how comfortable it is. Easy to move from car to car as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hamish

customer_reviews.title: Look around may be less money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace car seat for 6 y/o granddaughter to make room for her 3 y/o sister seat and 3 month old baby brother. It allows for 3 seats in the rear seat of a 4 door sedan. She’s old enough to know not to unlatch it without permission. As far as safety goes, I pray I never find out. Look around, I saw it at Target for 19.99. No it wasn’t a sale
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to upgrade to this booster seat and he was no my disappointed. I liked that it was easy to install and that it is sturdy. My son says it is it comfortable and he loves that there are 2 cupholders that you can push back in when not in use. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Prete

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice size. Easy to assemble. Not heavy. Easily transferable to different vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: C Irvin

customer_reviews.title: For Papa’s Boy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grandson. Now he rides like a big boy. Really works well and is comfortable to him. He is 5 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I thought Graco was a good product so chose this booster for my grandson. It concerned me that it didn't fit as tightly to the seat as an infant seat, but maybe it wasn't supposed to. I wasn't sure. Then I noticed small snags in the fabric that started to unravel and this is how it looks today after only several months of light use. It's headed for the trash.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality booster for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great booster seat for the money. My grandson thinks he is a big kid now!
customer_reviews.author: Tim in OP

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to installing it.  They use the seat belts that come with the car.
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of it -- i pick up my granddaughter at school two days a week, and its so easy for her to slip into the car and connect her seat belt!
customer_reviews.author: Nina J. Sciuto

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Fits well for my 5 year old! Pops in and out easily for when we need to change where the seat is. It seems to slide a little over the buckle so i am always readjusting before she gets in, but that is probably relayed to how my seat is made.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K.

customer_reviews.title: Great child seat for Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Great child seat for Granddaughter. Well made. It seems to be comfortable for her. Two cup holders is a nice feature. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Radcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Transition
customer_reviews.text: We got this because our daughter was outgrowing her 5 point Car Seat. So we purchased this for our son and gave his to our daughter. Wasn't sure if it would move around when he wasn't in the seat but it doesn't. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H Suitonu

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I liked this booster seat, bought for my nephew because hes pretty big for a 4 year old and my brother was using one he barely fit in, easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Not affixed with metal clips to the frame on safe do not recommend if you love your children.
customer_reviews.text: Does not a fix to metal clips in the back of the seat. It slides around when not in use. It is unsafe I do not like it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you think it is.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, does the job, positions the belt. The cup holders make me laugh - I don't think we've ever put anything in them but rocks and tissues.
customer_reviews.author: Sopranna

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in small car.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Honda Fit and it fitted this small car very well. The cup holders are convenient and possible to push inside if not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: booster chair for car
customer_reviews.text: It's a great seat for our grandchildren. They are 7 and 4 so it is appropriate seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, and cheap fabric:(
customer_reviews.text: Material is way to thin. Ripped on the first use!
customer_reviews.author: R. Mckee

customer_reviews.title: Good but daughter can't sleep in this
customer_reviews.text: Good but daughter can't sleep in this over the arm rests I'm going back to the younger styles until she can find a way to sleep in this and be comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Eric Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great - as stated!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is getting bigger and needed a booster instead of a car seat! He loved the pop out cup holders. Very comfortable too! Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: Laura DeSmit

customer_reviews.title: Good design.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy design and is easily placed in the car seat for child entry.
customer_reviews.author: Bigal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I did research and this brand is top notch and reliable. You cannot beat this price/value. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: aliquidj

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I recommend this product. My child finds it comfortable and the dual cup holders are handy. Unfortunately, we've only had it a couple of months and the fabric has pilled and frayed slightly. I'm sure that we'll still get plenty of use out of it but it is a bit disappointing that just the normal wear and tear imposed by sitting results in somewhat unsightly seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: kristin m.

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: They have a tendency to shift around even when strapped down. I have 3 kids 1 in a carseat the other 2 in these. Its a tight squeeze especially when a fit is being thrown. They are super easy to put in and take out.
customer_reviews.author: chantel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works fine so far, and the pad stays on better than our other car seats. No flimsy black strings that lose elasticity in a week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Graco TurboBooster Backless Booster Car Seat, Galaxy
product_meta.description: Graco's top-rated Backless TurboBooster Car Seat helps keep your big kid safe in the car. This backless booster seat is built for comfort with a padded seat and height-adjustable armrests. It's a terrific option to help protect older children and kids who are ready to transition out of a harness booster, but not yet ready to ride with just your vehicle's seat belt. According to the American Academy of Pediatrics and the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, school-aged children should ride in a belt-positioning booster seat until at least age 8 or until the seat belt fits correctly. The Backless TurboBooster car seat is designed to protect children ages 4 to 10 who are between 40 and 100 pounds and 43 to 57 inches tall. Dual, hideaway cup holders are just right for holding your child's cups or water bottles, so that they've got just what they need for a comfortable ride in the car with you. After all, a comfortable passenger is a happy passenger. When you're ready to clean your deluxe, padded seat cushion, simply remove it and wash it in your washing machine with gentle detergent. Then, all plastic parts of the seat may be cleaned with mild soap and water. The Backless TurboBooster seat has been engineered and rigorously crash tested to meet or exceed all applicable US standards. Product information/Technical Details Chart: Minimum height recommendation: 43 inches Maximum height recommendation: 57 inches.
feature_bullets: This Graco booster car seat helps safely Transport Your big kid from ages 4 to 10; from 40 to 100 pounds; and from 43 to 57 inches tall
Backless booster is Top rated by leading consumer magazines and publications
Booster seat is rigorously crash tested to meet or exceed U.S safety Standards and reassure safety conscious parents
Engineered and crash tested to meet or exceed US Standard FMVSS 213
Designed to be the kind of stylish, comfortable seat Your child will actually want to ride in

Graco Protect Plus Engineered: a combination of the most rigorous crash tests that helps protect Your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes; additional testing based on the New Car Assessment Program and for extreme car interior temperatures
